New Records: Lauri Markkanen netted a game-high 35 points and added nine rebounds
Key Match Events: Santi Aldama had team highs with 27 points and five 3-pointers
Desmond Bane scored 24 points and hit a key 3-pointer with about six minutes left in the fourth quarter
Ja Morant tallied 22 points, 10 assists and five rebounds for the Grizzlies
Walker Kessler’s tip-in with under three minutes remaining tied the game 116-116
Morant and Marcus Smart then made key layups in the waning moments to secure the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Utah outrebounded Memphis 49-41, but the Grizzlies turned 17 turnovers by the Jazz into 24 points and hit seven more 3-pointers (17 vs. 10)
The Jazz scored the game’s first five points on buckets by Sexton and Markkanen
Memphis answered with an 11-3 run capped by consecutive 3-pointers by Aldama
Others: The Grizzlies withstood a big rally from the Utah Jazz for a 126-124 victory in each team’s NBA season opener
Three Memphis players scored at least 22 points
